prompt:
Use case: chapter 1 cinematic beat
Primary request: A central strategic lever tilts toward governed language and the chosen side glows upward
Scene/background: ceremonial chamber with one lever on a fulcrum
Subject: single porcelain lever with two outcome plates
Action: lever slowly tilts to the governed side and stabilizes
Camera: centered wide shot with subtle dolly-in
Lighting/mood: top-left soft key with mint glow on selected side
Color palette: cream white, muted teal, near-black frame
Style/format: premium minimal bas-relief cinematic render
Timing/beats: beat 1 neutral center, beat 2 deliberate tilt, beat 3 stable glow
Constraints: premium executive tone, no aggressive sales messaging, no text overlays
Avoid: dramatic explosions, strobing lights, cluttered stage
